tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Seema, You have made so much of difference in our lives being our first guiding angel with your kindness, sincere caring and boundless support to us in everyway. After 40 plus of age and trying such treatment, you helped and guided us take tough decisions and supporting mentally strong in our journey just not limiting to our visits. All these you have turned into very fruitful start in our journey towards lifetime gift. We are forever thankful whole heartedly to you and your kind team who were so amazing in support parents like us.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Wonder how to express the special care and service that Dr has towards the patient.Walked in Cloudnine with no reference and met Dr.Seema Manjunath,made me comfortable,relieved me from pressure in the very first visit itself. Understood us well and was a moral support and has guided us so far.To keep me active,got in a job and Dr and staffs were very supportive with the timings and in all ways to be away from pressure in every visit.Dr and staffs all gave us hope and thanks a lot  for all the prayers.Request Dr to continue the service wherever you are.We are eager to bring the baby to this world and share the happiness with Dr and all of you there  in Cloudnine. Thank you very much  Dr and thank you to all staffs.Love you Dr.Loved the service at Cloudnine .Best Wishes . Tons of Love - Chandrika & Sridhar
Dr Seema,She is an excellent doctor. . Sheâ€™s extremely caring, supportive and kind. Very professional and approachable.I Recommend others ..pls do cosult this doctor..

We started consulting with Dr. Seema right from the time we had plans of a baby. As I was particular about making sure that I am fit for pregnancy, I went through the pre-pregnancy evaluation as per her advised tests and scans. Based on the reports, Dr. Seema also made sure I was monitored regularly for my thyroid and iron levels. She also helped us understand the process of healthy conception based on the fertility period, balanced diet, sufficient sleep, exercise, etc. She also was available on call/ texts throughout for any concerns during my pregnancy, labour and after the birth of my child. My son is 1.5 years old now, and Dr. Seema still remains to be  the doctor I would go to for almost all my concerns regarding my health and wellbeing. *** ** *** ** *** **** ******* * **** *** *** interacted so far and I totally recommend her!

After struggling through infertility for 2 years, My husband and I went to Dr. Seema Manjunath and it has been the best decision we have ever made. Because of her we are expecting our first baby in May 2021. We were completely lost starting out. Dr. Seema took the time to walk us through all of our options, answered all our questions and has truly been there for us in every step of the way. She genuinely cares for her patients and knows what's best for you. Highly recommended her.

I am happy to write this review about Dr Seema. I am greatful to her for giving new life in my hands. She is methodical in her approach and keeps us informed about every procedure she does. Both my wife and sister have been treated by her and we always felt we are in safe hands. Thank you once again Doc.

Excellent service very delighted becoming a father

First thing that comes to my mind is the eversmiling face and positive attitude of Dr Seema.
The entire journey from wanna be parent to getting a confirmation (Good news)has been smooth and wonderful.Kudos to the entire staff of Cloudnine fertility OAR for their dedication and selfless service .
Keep on the good work and bring hope to the life of others 
A special thanks to sister.Rosy ....â˜º

review: She is one of the moat calm doctor i have met in my life , she was like a god for us thank you so much for your wonderful guidance.
She is very patient and understanding in nature while we try to explain our problem. Overall very friendly and kind Doctor.
